ygData.subject: Possable Escape!
ygData.msgSnippet: * The fire that Rex had sent sailed over BrightBlades head, causing her to cry out in alarm and duck her head, stumbling in the process. She quickly regained

* The fire that Rex had sent sailed over BrightBlades head, causing her to 
cry out in alarm and duck her head, stumbling in the process. She quickly 
regained her balance and continued to run down the hall as fast as her legs 
could carry her.
The auto-guns weren�t helping much either, dodging them was harder then she 
had first thought. But as she ran she managed to skitter out of the way of 
most of the blasts, occasionally being hit in the back from a shot she just 
couldn�t avoid.
Focusing over the loud explosions of the roof defenses she heard the foot 
beats of pursuing bots, three to be exact.
But she ran the line of a desperate bot; one that would do whatever it took 
to get away.
If the Maximals caught her now they would kill her, she was sure of that. 
Either that or imprison her without release, ever.
BrightBlade cried out again as she suddenly felt her right knee buckle, 
sending her into a stumble, finally catching herself on the wall. She 
couldn�t stop, not if she wanted to get away. And that was ALL she wanted.
Weaponless, she couldn�t turn and defend herself. So, running for her life 
was as good an idea as ever at this point.
She hauled herself to her feet, using the wall to help her.
It was Firearm�s shot that had got her, the other two sailing away further 
down the hall.
Using the wall for support she continued down the hall, going as fast as she 
could with her damaged knee.
With her hands cuffed she couldn�t do much, clinging to the wall as she 
ran/stumbled down the hall.
But Firearm, Rex and Grimmler were in hot pursuit and she had slowed down a 
bit, making it easier for them to catch up to her.
But the thought of being caught caused her to let go of the wall, missing 
her steps for a few paces before picking up her pace.
He chest was bleeding like the Pit and her knee hurt just as bad, but she 
didn�t care.
She wouldn�t let them catch her!
BrightBlades head snapped up as she heard something, the auto-guns ahead of 
her had activated!
Her breath was quickened with panic, her mind reeling to come up with some 
sort of idea to get away from this.
Finally she came to the end of the hall to a T section, two other halls 
running off to her right and left.
She turned to the right without even thinking�and finally met her match!
An auto-gun that was being controlled from the bridge, right in front of 
her.
BrightBlade didn�t even have enough time to gasp before she found herself 
hitting the far wall down the left section of the wall.
Her body went straight against the wall as she hit, then curling into a ball 
as the pain came to her.
A strangled wail erupted from her throat as she coiled around herself, a 
puddle of mech-fluid quickly forming around her.
But with more will-power then she thought she ever had she began to uncoil 
from her ball, slowly raising to her hands and knees. But she couldn�t get 
to her feet, raising her head and not believing what she saw.
It was some sort of shoot, like the ones that others used to deposit their 
dirty laundry.
With a groan she slowly crawled towards it, hoping that she could get there 
before the Maximals were upon her and had their guns pressed to her head. *
